tag_list: online-marketing, digital-media, social-media, viral-marketing, iphone-applications, online-media-strategy, creativity
overview:
Molly Parsley is currently the Communications Director at San Francisco-based ad agency Pereira & O’Dell. Among the client roster are Corona, Coda Automotive, LEGO, Muscle Milk, Ubisoft and University of Phoenix. In September 2009, her agency was named Advertising Ageâ€™s Small Agency of the Year, West Coast and featured in 7x7 Magazine’s Hot 20 List in October 2009.

Previously, Molly was the Marketing & PR Director at AKQA working closely with CEO, Tom Bedecarre. Her efforts during her five year tenure facilitated many of the agency’s accolades including â€œAgency of the Yearâ€ wins from Advertising Age, Adweek, OMMA and SHOOT Magazines as well as Creativity’s first-ever Interactive Agency of the Year. AKQA was also named in Fast Company’s “Fast 50”, featuring the world’s 50 most innovative companies.

Prior to AKQA, Molly was the Marketing & PR Manager at internet advertising firm Lot21 and worked closely under the direction of Kate Everett-Thorp, building Lot21â€™s solid reputation in Emerging Technologies. When Lot21 was acquired by Carat Interactive in January 2002, she then had opportunity to work with Sarah Fay to leverage the agencyâ€™s unique combination of media and creative capabilities.
